text: Ara tomara kache amara abatarana karechi e'i kitaba satyera sathe, ebam purbabarti dharmagranthe ya ache tara satya-samarthanarupe, ara tara upare praharirupe, sejan'ya tadera madhye bicara karo ya allah nayila karechena tara dbara, ara tadera hina-basanara anusarana karo na tomara prati satyera ya eseche tara prati bimukha haye. Tomadera madhyera pratyekera jan'ya amara nirdharana karechilama eka-ekati sariyat o eka-ekati patha. Ara yadi allah icche karatena tabe tini tomadera banatena eka'i jati, kintu tini yena tomadera yaca'i karate parena tomadera ya tini diyechena tara dbara, kaje'i bhalokaje parasparera sange pratiyogita karo.
